sen.j: 『古都』（こと）は、川端康成の昭和30年代前半の小説。
sen.e: "Koto"(The Old Capital) is a novel written by Yasunari KAWABATA during the period from 1950 to 1955.
"Koto"(The Old Capital) is a novel written by Yasunari KAWABATA between 1950 and 1955.
"Koto" is a novel written by Yasunari KAWABATA between 1950 and 1955.
sen.cmt: 前出補足を削除しました。

sen.j: 古都・京都を舞台に、生き別れになった双子の姉妹の数奇な運命を描いた物語。
sen.e: With the old capital, Kyoto, as the setting, it describes the checkered destinies of twin sisters separated at birth.
With the old capital, Kyoto, as the setting, it describes the checkered destinies of twin sisters separated at birth.
With the old capital, Kyoto, as the setting, it describes the checkered destinies of twin sisters separated at birth.
